description:
After an awful retake hell, Yasumi asks Kagasaki for help. They try figure out what Sugishita wants by recalling the audition. At school, Yasumi heeds Kagasaki`s order to not overwork herself and joins the karaoke party and forces Chika to come too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 夕陽とやすみとクリスマス
